desc.p: Represents the reference number to uniquely identify a particular Tickler schedule. This Tickler schedule ID comprises of two components, the first of which is the Tickler ID followed by an underscore '_' and then appended with the scheduled date of the Tickler.
ID field of EB.TICKLER.SCHEDULE. System generated table and field.
Holds the free text message that was input in the Tickler.
